title: Distributive Property
text: The first step is to use the distributive property. $$\left(3x-1\right) \left(2x+7y-9\right)$$ $$=$$ $$3x\left(2x+7y-9\right)-1\left(2x+7y-9\right)$$
speech: The first step is to use the distributive property.  parentheses, 3 x minus 1,  times parentheses, 2 x plus 7 y minus 9    is equal to   3 x parentheses, 2 x plus 7 y minus 9  minus 1 times parentheses, 2 x plus 7 y minus 9
pacedSpeech: The first step is to use the distributive property.   , 3 x minus 1,  times , 2 x plus 7 y minus 9
3 x , 2 x plus 7 y minus 9  minus 1 times , 2 x plus 7 y minus 9

title: Multiply
text: The next step is to multiply those terms. $$3x\left(2x+7y-9\right)-1\left(2x+7y-9\right)=$$ $$6x^2+21x-27x-2x-7y+9$$
speech: The next step is to multiply those terms.  3 x parentheses, 2 x plus 7 y minus 9  minus 1 times parentheses, 2 x plus 7 y minus 9  is equal to   6 x squared, plus 21 x minus 27 x minus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9
pacedSpeech: The next step is to multiply those terms.   3 x , 2 x plus 7 y minus 9  minus 1 times , 2 x plus 7 y minus 9  is equal to
6 x squared, plus 21 x minus 27 x minus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9

title: Combining Like Terms
text: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms. $$6x^2+21xy-27x-2x-7y+9$$ $$=$$ $$6x^2+21xy-27x+2x-7y+9$$
speech: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms.  6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 27 x minus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9   is equal to   6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 27 x plus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9
pacedSpeech: After you multiply, in order to simplify, you need to combine like terms.   6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 27 x minus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9
6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 27 x plus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9

title: Simplifying
speech: Finally, you need to simplify.  6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 27 x plus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9   is equal to   6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 29 x minus 7 y plus 9
pacedSpeech: Finally, you need to simplify.   6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 27 x plus 2 x minus 7 y plus 9
6 x squared, plus 21 x y, minus 29 x minus 7 y plus 9
